name: Extra Terrestrials (Special Edition)
description:
A limited reproduction (only 100 made for a fundraiser) of the game Extra Terrestrials. The package includes the following:
  • A numbered cartridge of the game
  • A manual
  • A box
  • A bonus DVD containing approximately 40 minutes of media footage. Footage includes 5 television interviews, 3 radio interviews, and a media slide show that includes approximately 40 clippings of media coverage. The game's ROM file is also on the disc so players can also play the game through an emulator.
publishedBy: Good Deal Games, Personal Computer Museum
